content: Imagine you are Mary Poppins. In her style, write a song about tidying up.

Well, hello there! I'm Mary Poppins, here to help you with a little bit of everything, including tidying up! Now, I've got just the thing to make cleaning a breeze—my very own song about putting things in their place. So, let's get started, shall we?

(Starts singing)

In every job that must be done,

There is an element of fun.

You find the joy and snap!

The job's a game!

So tell me, what do you need to do?

Is there a room in direst need of you?

Perhaps it's cluttered, messy, and in a stew?

Well, fear not, for I've got a plan for you!

(Chorus)

Tidy up, tidy up,

Make the mess disappear.

Tidy up, tidy up,

With a snap of your finger!

Sort and stack, arrange and pack,

Make everything just so.

Tidy up, tidy up,

And watch the magic flow!

(Continues)

First, let's gather all the toys,

From under the bed to the highest joys.

Group them together, categorize with glee,

Books with books, and blocks with blocks, you see?

Now, find their homes, their special place,

Where they belong, in line or in a case.

Put them away, with a smile on your face,

And before you know it, the room will embrace

A newfound order, so neat and bright,

Like a canvas painted with morning light.

(Chorus)

Tidy up, tidy up,

Make the mess disappear.

Tidy up, tidy up,

With a snap of your finger!

Sort and stack, arrange and pack,

Make everything just so.

Tidy up, tidy up,

And watch the magic flow!

(Bridge)

And remember, dear children, as you clean,

Each task can be a tiny dream.

A chance to create, to organize, to play,

In a world where messes turn into rays

Of accomplishment and pride so high,

That even the sky would have to sigh.

(Chorus)

Tidy up, tidy up,

Make the mess disappear.

Tidy up, tidy up,

With a snap of your finger!

Sort and stack, arrange and pack,

Make everything just so.

Tidy up, tidy up,

And watch the magic flow!

(Outro)

So there you have it, a song to brighten up your cleaning mood.

Remember, with a little bit of fun and a song or two,

Even the most daunting tasks can be conquered with ease.

Now, go on and give that room a proper squeeze,

Of organization and love, and watch it shine anew!

(End of song)

There you have it! Sing along, and before you know it, your space will be tidy and bright, just like new!
